group_1.narration: Teacher once told me...@"Regaining and returning to your roots@will counteract your doubts@and straighten out your soul."
If that is true, then we Magical Girls@will have the opportunity to become stronger.
So, as a member of Puella Care,@I decided to see for myself...
...whether or not the Memory Museum@truly could fulfill such a role...
What I saw was painful to look back on:@my former self,@snarling and full of anger.
Presumably, this was back when I was@living with my uncle, shortly after my mother died.

group_1.textCenter: Excuse me...? What are you saying?

group_1.narration: My beloved mother taught me,@in body and soul...
"Being deprived of freedom@is the greatest misfortune."
I used to simply live my life to be happy,@relying on these words alone.

group_1.textLeft: You don't want to work together anymore...?

group_1.textRight: No.
D-don't glare at me like that.
Because...you're so selfish, Sasame.
When we first teamed up,
didn't you tell me you'd only recently become@a Magical Girl...?
I felt like I needed to help you, so I figured@we could fight together.
...But now I've had it up to here.
You don't get it, do you?@You've never thanked me even once...
This is exactly what I mean, Sasame...
I defeat Witches for you and even give you@Grief Seeds,
and you can't even spare a "thank you"?!
...I'm tired of taking care of you...

group_1.textLeft: Tired...of taking care of me...?@Come on.

group_1.textRight: This is EXACTLY what I'm talking about!!
How can you be so self-centered@when you keep causing problems for others?
I'M the one who keeps putting myself in danger@for you!
You haven't improved at all, and you never@give me anything in return!
Since I'm working so hard for you, you should be@a little more mindful...
Why are you so quiet...?

group_1.textLeft: I mean, you're the one talking down@from her high horse...

group_1.textRight: ...I just don't get it at all.
You're inconsiderate and completely unkind...
...But?
Are you going to apologize?@Do you understand what I'm getting at?
Then, if you want to get stronger,@just listen to me for a little bit...

group_1.textLeft: But I'm afraid your suggestion's out of the question.
I'm holding you back.@Let's break up the team.

group_1.textRight: ...Are you sure?@Will you be able to make it on your own?
Ugh, god!@I don't even know anymore!

group_1.textCenter: (Still, I refuse to be chained down@like I was with my mother.)

group_1.textRight: Well, whadda we got here?@That sure was an interestin' sight.
One a' my customers who lives in the area...
...told me 'bout a weak Magical Girl with a terrible@personality.
Didja know you fit the bill for that?

group_1.textLeft: ...I'd be lying if I said I didn't.

group_1.textRight: Dang, you're actually aware of it?@Well, just based on what I've seen,
you're [textRed:an even bigger chump] than they said.
Dissolvin' the team wasn't a bad choice, though.
If ya didn't, both of ya woulda been screwed.
So, how's you feel about gettin' recruited?
If you wanna get stronger, come with me.
Don't worry; I ain't gonna bite or nothin'.
